name: opportunities-aggregator-production
description: Production package for Edutu Opportunities Aggregator

scripts.health-check: node -e "const http = require('http'); http.get('http://localhost:3000/api/health', (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => { const result = JSON.parse(data); console.log('Health:', result.status); process.exit(result.status === 'healthy' || result.status === 'degraded' ? 0 : 1); }); }).on('error', () => { console.log('Health: down'); process.exit(1); });"
